body.section: Hierarchy TelcomPatient is a kind of HumanPatient

section.title: Description
section.p: This class contains patient information that is unique to the NCPDP Telecommunication standard. This class is modeled as a separate sub-type of Patient in order to illustrate the differences between different standards.

stentry.p: "Code indicating the patient as pregnant or non-pregnant." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 335-2C, Data Dictionary 201104).
"Code indicating the patient as a smoker or non-smoker." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 334-1C, Data Dictionary 201104).

"Code identifying the patient’s place of residence." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 384-4X, Data Dictionary 201104). Possible values include: Home; Skilled Nursing Facility; Nursing Facility; Assisted Living Facility; Custodial Care Facility; Group Home; Inpatient Psychiatric Facility; Psychiatric Facility – Partial Hospitalization; Intermediate Care Facility/Mentally Retarded; Residential Substance Abuse Treatment Facility; Hospice; Psychiatric Residential Treatment Facility; Comprehensive Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility; Homeless Shelter; Correctional Institution.
